attributes.action: make the £350 million as week we save from leaving the EU go towards the NHS
attributes.additional_details: Make the 17+ million voter happy by helping the NHS and Britain
attributes.background:
We have been promised that the £350 million a week we save for leaving the EU will go towards the NHS or even more important things,  now we have won the vote ❎ its turns out it was all a lie.

You can see how many people are angry about this issue and now regretting there vote
